definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
Logger Vick (Boonie Bears character)/nickname for bald people

sentences.english: It was a sight to watch my hairless Sindu walking towards her classroom.
sentences.chinese: 看着我的光头欣顿走向教室，那真是一大景色。

sentences.english: The notables then went away, and on the third day they all came with shaved heads.
sentences.chinese: 宴会散了，可第三天那些名人显贵都剃了光头来赴宴。

sentences.english: Shaving down contributes to peak performance.
sentences.chinese: 剃光头有助于提高成绩。

sentences.english: Half the sky burns red, pressing heavily down upon the bald head of the sun.
sentences.chinese: 半边天烧红了，重甸甸地压在夕阳的光头上。

sentences.english: Those skinheads are always hanging around together in the street.
sentences.chinese: 那些光头仔总是一起在街上闲荡。

sentences.english: I began to shave baldheaded, today is no longer decided to position.
sentences.chinese: 我今天开始剃个光头，就再也不用决定睡姿了。

sentences.english: He is one of few men who look better completely bald.
sentences.chinese: 他是为数不多剃了光头更好看的演员。

sentences.english: He dashed into my room, hatless, barefooted and out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 他光头赤脚，气喘嘘嘘地冲进我的房间来。

sentences.english: The application of pump cavity in laser diode (LD) side-pumped laser head is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了抽运腔在半导体侧面抽运固体激光头中的应用。

sentences.english: The winter is coming now, how about your cool bareheaded feeling?(
sentences.chinese: 冬天已经来了，你的酷光头不冷吗？

sentences.english: His hair grew back thicker after he shaved his head.
sentences.chinese: 他剃光头以后头发长得更浓密了。

sentences.english: Men with shaved heads were rated lower in attractiveness and also seen as being older.
sentences.chinese: 剃光头的男子被认为不太有吸引力，而且看上去更老。

sentences.english: Baldy Li, for instance, has a toilet seat plated with gold.
sentences.chinese: 如李光头拥有一个镀金座便马桶。

sentences.english: The slick-looking young man in the sunglasses is playing a gangster in a fraud syndicate
sentences.chinese: 图中戴墨镜的光头男子正在扮演一个歹徒。

sentences.english: So he went to the skinhead youth road.
sentences.chinese: 从而使他走向了光头青年的道路。

definition: beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
